name: DIFFERENCE AND REPETITION > CIRCULAR ARTIFACTS (DIGITAL) #1
description:
A two decade long project, inspired by Deleuze, to mimic systems of growth and evolution via the steady, patient accumulation of error. 

One line is placed - the following line then attempts to as closely mimic the previous as possible, including the imperfections. In the Circular Artifacts series, this process is repeated, but ignores the finality of the bounding box - lines are drawn continuously until the circle is filled.
